content: sewing snout round 1 chain 3 1 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the next st you will now be working on the opposite side of the chain 2 single_crochet in the next st 6 round 2 increase increase 1 single_crochet increase increase 1 single_crochet 10 3 increase 3 single_crochet increase increase 3 single_crochet increase 14 round 4 1 single_crochet in every st around 14 scales/spikes make 6 finish off stuff leave a long tail for sewing round 1 4 single_crochet in a magic_ring 4 round 2 1 single_crochet increase around 6 round 3 1 single_crochet increase around 9 round 4 1 single_crochet in each st around 9 finish off don t stuff leave a long tail for sewing this pattern requires a 3 50mm crochet hook 4-ply worsted weight yarn in two or more colors stuffing 8mm safety eyes in black or desired color assembly is fairly straightforward sew the snout on between row 9 and 12 assemble the body by first sewing the tail on between row 3 and 8 then sew the feet on between row 3 and 9 5 sts away from the bottom most of the tail on either side sew the arms between row 10 and 11 this pattern requires a 3 50mm crochet hook 4-ply worsted weight yarn in two or more colors stuffing 8mm safety eyes in black or desired color next attach 2 scales going up the tail with a stitch separating them in between finally add the remaining 4 scales to the head all separated by one stitch then attach the head to the body and you re finished now you can enjoy your totally adorable and totally customized dinosaur plush this pattern requires a 3 50mm crochet hook 4-ply worsted weight yarn in two or more colors stuffing 8mm safety eyes in black or desired color this pattern its photos and all other components included are property of melimooncrochet you may sell the items created from this pattern but may not sell or otherwise redistribute this pattern should you have any questions comments or concerns you are welcome to contact me through the social platforms listed
